DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Pharmacokinetics safety Azilsartan Trimethylethanolamine healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Phase Ⅰa Study Azilsartan Trimethylethanolamine Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Aged 18 year 45 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 25kg/m2 Has know sensitivity angiotensin II receptor blocker（ARB） With evidence uncontrolled renal , hepatic , central nervous system , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic dysfunction , opinion investigator medical monitor Has know suspect history alcoholism drug abuse misuse With history laboratory result show presence hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C antibody ( HCVAb ) , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Pregnant , lactating，menstrual Vegetarian Postural hypotension Systolic blood pressure < 100mmHg，or > 130mmHg ; and/or diastolic blood pressure < 70mmHg , > 90mmHg
